 A Sense of Importance
 Bryn is a digital artist raised in the South West of England where he now teaches art principles and techniques part time. Bryn's passion for painting was sparked by interests in comics and video games. Through books and magazines he has taught himself to paint competition winning images, in search of recognition and publicity on the world stage.
